body:
Thanks for the feedback! If your issue is related to the Flutter framework itself,
please open an issue at
[github.com/flutter/flutter](https://github.com/flutter/flutter/issues/new).

## Steps to Reproduce

Open the Android studio IDE and try to build flutter apk.


## What happened

Every time restarted the Android studio, it occurred.

## Version information

Android Studio `Bumblebee | 2021.1.1 Canary 3` â€¢ Flutter plugin `io.flutter 58.0.3` â€¢ Dart plugin `211.7665`

Error getting Flutter sdk information.

## Exception

null


comment_data.body: Android Studio Canary is not currently supported.

title: Error getting Flutter sdk information.
